articles.title: Trump is not immune from New York's subpoena but the prosecutor won't get documents for now
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Thursday blocked House Democrats from accessing President Donald Trump's financial records, but ruled that the President is not immune from a subpoena for his financial documents from a New York prosecutor.
